SEARCH
Package game.items.consumables

Class HealingVial

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.consumables.HealingVial
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Consumable, Purchasable, Sellable
public class HealingVial extends Item implements Consumable, Purchasable, Sellable
Represents a Healing Vial item in the game, which is consumable, purchasable, and sellable. Consuming a Healing Vial restores an actor's health attribute by a certain percentage. It can be purchased from or sold to trader actors.
Author:
Enrico Tanvy Modified by: Group6

  • Constructor Details

    • HealingVial

      public HealingVial()
      Constructs a Healing Vial item with the name "Healing vial" and a display character 'a'. It is both purchasable and sellable.

  • Method Details

    • consume

      public String consume(Actor actor)
      Consumes the Healing Vial, increasing the actor's health by a percentage of their maximum health.
      Specified by:
      consume in interface Consumable
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor consuming the Healing Vial.
      Returns:
      A message describing the consumption and its effects.

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor owner)
      Returns a list of allowable actions that an owner of this item can perform. In this case, it includes the ability to consume the Healing Vial.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Item
      Parameters:
      owner - The actor who owns the Healing Vial.
      Returns:
      A list of allowable actions for the owner of the item.

    • purchase

      public String purchase(Actor actor, Actor seller)
      Purchases the Healing Vial from a seller actor, deducting the purchase price from the buyer's balance.
      Specified by:
      purchase in interface Purchasable
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor buying the Healing Vial.
      seller - The actor selling the Healing Vial.
      Returns:
      A message describing the purchase and the updated balance of the buyer.

    • getPurchasePrice

      public int getPurchasePrice(Actor seller)
      Calculates the purchase price of the Healing Vial. The price is higher if the seller actor has the SUSPICIOUS capability.
      Specified by:
      getPurchasePrice in interface Purchasable
      Parameters:
      seller - The actor selling the Healing Vial.
      Returns:
      The purchase price of the Healing Vial.

    • sell

      public String sell(Actor actor)
      Sells the Healing Vial to a trader actor, adding the selling price to the seller's balance. There is a chance for the item to be sold at double its normal price.
      Specified by:
      sell in interface Sellable
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor selling the Healing Vial.
      Returns:
      A message describing the sale and the updated balance of the seller.

    • getSellingPrice

      Retrieves the selling price of the Healing Vial item.

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor target, Location location)
      Returns a list of allowable actions that a trader actor can perform with this item. In this case, it includes the ability to sell the Healing Vial to the trader.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Item
      Parameters:
      target - The trader actor interacting with the Healing Vial.
      location - The location where the interaction takes place.
      Returns:
      A list of allowable actions for the trader actor.
